original_title: Pierre Hébert: Le Goût Du Risque
overview: One morning, Pierre Hébert woke up with the fear of becoming the spectator of his own life by settling in comfort and stability. It was on that day that he decided to cultivate A taste for risk. In this bitingly ironic second show, he derides his own fears in order to convince himself to leap into the void! With a hilarious sincerity, he draws inspiration from the laughable and absurd aspects of his daily life to make viewers want to get out of the routine, to make daring choices. Will you take the risk of falling under its charm?
title: Pierre Hébert: Le Goût Du Risque
